alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 3:50AM PDT until April 23 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 9 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highway 33 in Ventura County as well as Interstate 5 and Highway 14 in Los Angeles County. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
